name: threejs-slice-geometry
author: tdhooper
description: Slice three.js geometry with a plane.

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run webpack
scripts.compile: npm run compile:cjs && npm run compile:esm
scripts.compile:esm: tsc -p tsconfig.json --target ES2015 --module ESNext --outdir src/esm/ --moduleResolution node
scripts.webpack: npm run webpack:dev && npm run webpack:prod
scripts._build: npm run _clean && npm run _browserify && npm run _uglify
